word_mean: 活动星系核中活动性极强，平均红移最大的一类，因视形态类似恒星得名。

sentence.Network_en: Within a few million years, quasar and galaxy will have merged.
sentence.Network_cn: 在几百万年的时间里, 类星体和伴星系将会合并在一起.

sentence.Network_en: Therefore , quasar absorption lines cosmological probes of formation and evolution of galaxies.
sentence.Network_cn: 对类星体吸收线的研究将有助于我们了解星系的形成和演化.

sentence.Network_en: A radio galaxy is related to, but appears larger than, a quasar.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个射电星系与之有关, 但是它比类星体要大.

entry.def: A quasar is an object far away in space that produces bright light and radio waves.

means.word_mean: 1. a starlike object that may send out radio waves and other forms of energy; large red shifts imply enormous recession velocities

sentences.en: Quasars are the highly energetic cores of distant galaxies.
sentences.cn: 类星体是遥远星系的极为活跃的核心体。
